document.docAuthor: Yakovlev, Roman V., Pljustch, Igor G., Skrylnik, Yuriy, Pak, Oleg & Witt, Thomas J.
document.masterDocTitle: The Cossidae (Lepidoptera) of Afghanistan with description of three new species and special notes on the fauna of Bande-Amir National Park

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Cossidae (Lepidoptera) of Afghanistan with description of three new species and special notes on the fauna of Bande-Amir National Park

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species.
Endagria agilis
Christoph, 1884
, by original designation.

Semagystia agilis (
Christoph, 1884
)
(
Figs 47 −48
, 80, 82 ,
90 , 114
)
Type locality: Krasnowodsk [ Turkmenistan ].
Type material: syntypes in ZISP , examined.

Semagystia bamiani Yakovlev, Pljustch, Skrylnik & Pak
,
sp. nov.
( Figs 49 , 81, 83 ,
90 , 110
) Type locality: Afghanistan , Bamian, Band-e-Amir.
Type material: holotype (male) in ZISP , examined.
Distribution: central Afghanistan .
Habitat and biology. Flight period: July. Altitude: 3100 m .

Semagystia pushtunica
Yakovlev, 2007
(
Figs 50
, 115 )

Yakovlev, 2007
: 5−6 .
Type locality: N. Afghanistan , Prov. Badakhshan, Khwahan (Darwaz), Pari Kham. Type material: holotype (male) in ZFMK , examined.
Distribution: N. Afghanistan , Prov. Badakhshan.
Habitat and biology. Flight period: July. Altitude: 2500 m .

Material examined:
4 males
( holotype and paratypes ), N. Afghanistan , Prov. Badakhshan, Khwahan (Darwaz), Pari Kham, 2500 m , 30 .0 7.72 , lg. Brade & Naum[ann]., ex coll. R. Bender ( ZFMK ).
Type locality: Afghanistan , Bandeamir.
Type material: holotype (male) in MWM , examined.
Distribution: Central Afghanistan , Bamian Prov.

Habitat and biology. Flight period: July. Altitude: 2200−3100 m . Material examined:
1 male
( holotype ), Afghanistan , Bandeamir, 2200 m , W. Thomas leg. ( MWM );
2 males
, Afghanistan , Bamian, Band-e-Amir, 3100 m , 13 .0 7.2013 , leg. I. Pljustch, Yu. Skrylnik & O. Pak (RYB).

Semagystia witti
Yakovlev, 2007
(
Figs 53−54
, 116 )

Yakovlev, 2007
: 9−10 .
Type locality: Afghanistan , Logar Tal.
Type material: holotype (male) in MWM , examined.
Distribution: Afghanistan .

Habitat and biology. Flight period: April-May. Altitude: 1100−2700 m . Material examined:
3 males
( holotype and paratypes ), Afghanistan , Logar Tal, 2700 m , 28 .0 5.1973 , coll. Dr. Liedgens ( MWM );
1 female
, O. Afghanistan , Sarobi, 1100 m , 24 .0 4.1961 , Ebert ( MWM );
5 males
,
2 females
, Afghanistan , 10 km NW Kabul, 19 .0 5.1965 , leg. Kasy & Vartian ( MWM , MNHW ).
Type locality: Alexander Gebirge [ Kyrgyzstan , Tian-Shan, Kirgizskii Mts.]. Type material: holotype (male) in MHUB .

Distribution: Kyrgyzstan , Tadzhikistan , Kazakhstan (
Yakovlev 2011
), new for Afghanistan . Habitat and biology. Flight period: June −July. Altitude: 3000 m . Material examined:
1 female
, Afghanistan , Paghman Gebirge (Kabul), 3000 m , Juni-Juli 1942 , leg. Brandt ( MNHS ).
